content: Under "Discover Group using NPI or TIN" the examples show a query for Group with three parts: part one is system (and in the example it is the HL7 V2 -0203 code system. Part 2 is the Code from that system listed as either "TAX" or "NPI and part three is the value of the tax or Npi number. This doesn't match with HL7 token search which has only two parts. Part 1 is the system and part 2 is the value. Can you explain?
